caption:
Meditation is not about self-improvement. It is about self-acceptance, which arises from self-understanding.

You learn a lot about your mind when you sit down and observe it.

All of our happiness and sorrow, all of our hopes and fears — arise in the mind.

Knowing your mind is essential for knowing how to live fully and deeply, and for knowing how to live with genuine peace.

Our free meditation course can assist you in your journey of developing an authentic practice.

Comment “free course” and we will DM you with more info 🙏

#meditation #awareness #healing
